alert.note: Alert for New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 27 at 6:20PM EDT until July 27 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL NEW CASTLE...CENTRAL CHESTER AND SOUTHWESTERN DELAWARE COUNTIES... At 620 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Coatesville, or 11 miles west of West Chester, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, West Chester, Coatesville, Westtown, Downingtown, Kennett Square, West Grove, Arden, Cheyney, Talleyville, Elam, Marshallton, Ashland, Gradyville, Concordville, Greenville, Hockessin, West Goshen, Chester Heights and South Coatesville. This includes Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 17 and 19. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
